title: New champion concept: Astraen
body:
Astraen
God of the stars

Passive-Galactic Body: all nearby allied champions gain 5% attack speed

Q-StarBurst: deals ap damage to nearby enemies and stunning them scales ap

W-Blessing of the Stars: he shields a allied unit depending on his total mana

E-Supernova teleports: to a close location and if landed on an enemy champion It deals ap damage

R-Meteor: shower allows 5 skills shots that are on a short delay that come down and blocks enemy champs

Idk just what r ur thoughts
Riot plzzzz

replies.body:
No offense, but he seems like a bit of a hodge-podge of existing abilities. His Q sounds like Soraka's old Q but with a stun. His E sounds like a Kassadin ult but a whole lot less useful only dealing damage if it hits a champ, no waveclear or jungle use there. His passive doesn't sound that good to be honest, 5% AS is barely 1 extra shot every 10 seconds for most adcs. And btw, is he ranged or melee?

Only thing that does sound interesting is his R. Giving him a terrain ability similar to Trundle's pillar but on a charge system could add some interesting utility. But dealing no damage does not make it a very good "ultimate" ability in my opinion. I know there are many ult's that deal no damage, but they usually have something else that makes them really strong.

You seem to have a decent concept. Keep working on it, make some changes to his kit so he has a more defined playstyle without being too stiff. Read up on some of the old News articles Riot has done when they release new champions or re-worked old ones. Look for when they talk about things like "champion identity" to see what you should look for when creating your own ideas.

Does his passive work on enemy's too?
Cause u haven't exactly noted who it gives AS to...
